live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
59082.summary: Some customers in the Langley Twp area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59082.title: Mar 17 - Langley (Langley Twp) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59065.summary: Some customers in the Meadowlands area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59065.title: Mar 16 - Medicine Hat (Meadowlands) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
